Sentencas: Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3 (LSGM) and Co-doped LSGM (LSGMC) powders were synthesized by coprecipitation using ammonium carbonate or ammonium bicarbonate precipitant.
Titulo: Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3 powder synthesis by carbonate coprecipitation

Sentencas: Precursor, calcined particles, and sintered pellets of LSGM were characterized using TGA, XRD, and SEM.
Titulo: Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3 powder synthesis by carbonate coprecipitation

Sentencas: The calcined powders of LSGM showed uniform microstructures with nearly spherical morphology and average particle size of 100-200 nm.
Titulo: Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3 powder synthesis by carbonate coprecipitation

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of the sintered LSGM and LSGMC pellets at 1400 degrees C was 4.5 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3 powder synthesis by carbonate coprecipitation

Sentencas: S/cm and 1.13 S/cm at measuring temperature of 800 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3 powder synthesis by carbonate coprecipitation

Sentencas: The internal microstructure was observed by FIB-SEM and it was found that the internal pores affected adversely on the ionic conductivity of the sintered LSGM pellets.
Titulo: Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3 powder synthesis by carbonate coprecipitation

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of the as-prepared powders would be improved by optimization of the preparation process.
Titulo: Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3 powder synthesis by carbonate coprecipitation

Sentencas: The results of this study indicated that ammonium carbonate coprecipitation could be used as a convenient and economic method to produce LSGM electrolyte for low temperature SOFCs.
Titulo: Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3 powder synthesis by carbonate coprecipitation
